item.title: 全球不确定性导致欧元区私营部门接近停滞
item.description: 欧元区私营部门在 6 月份几乎没有增长，由于美国反复无常的贸易政策和地缘政治冲突，企业对下一步的发展仍然一无所知。【原文：The euro area’s private sector barely grew in June, remaining in limbo as erratic US trade policy and geopolitical conflicts leave companies in the dark on what’s next.】

item.title: 尼日利亚货币危机加剧，威尔玛扩大在该国的业务
item.description: 总部设在新加坡的食品公司威尔玛国际有限公司（Wilmar International Ltd.）计划加强其在尼日利亚的棕榈油业务，因为尼日利亚的政策有助于稳定奈拉汇率，并增加了非洲人口最多国家的美元供应量。【原文：Wilmar International Ltd., the Singapore-based food company, plans to boost its palm oil business in Nigeria wooed by policies that have helped stabilize the naira and bolstered the availability of dollars in Africa’s most populous nation.】

item.title: Holcim 北美分公司 Amrize 在首次交易中下滑
item.description: Amrize Ltd 的股票在瑞士早盘交易中下滑，原因是这家北美水泥生产商已从 Holcim Ltd 分离出来，这家建材集团希望通过单独上市来释放价值。【原文：Amrize Ltd’s shares shares slipped in early trading in Switzerland following the North American cement-maker’s spinoff from Holcim Ltd, as the building materials conglomerate looks to unlock value through a separate listing.】

item.title: 德国私营部门增长，工业接近扭亏为盈
item.description: 德国私营部门经济本月恢复增长，这主要得益于制造业自 2022 年以来的最佳表现，这表明该行业的前景可能最终会有所改善。【原文：Germany’s private-sector economy returned to growth this month, buoyed by the best manufacturing performance since 2022 that shows the sector’s prospects may finally be improving.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚亲欧盟政党签署联合协议以解决预算缺口问题
item.description: 罗马尼亚的主流政党在经历了数月的政治动荡后签署了组建新政府的协议，其主要目标是解决欧盟最大的预算赤字问题。【原文：Romania’s mainstream parties signed an agreement to form a new government after months of political turmoil, with a key goal to tackle the European Union’s biggest budget deficit.】

item.title: 医疗技术公司 Brainlab、控股公司在法兰克福首次公开募股中募集 4 亿欧元资金
item.description: 医疗技术软件公司 Brainlab AG 及其股东正寻求在法兰克福首次公开募股中募集高达 4 亿欧元（4.6 亿美元）的资金。【原文：Medical technology software firm Brainlab AG and its shareholders are seeking up to €400 million ($460 million) in its Frankfurt initial public offering, as several European companies look to list ahead of the typical summer holiday break.】

item.title: 货币政策委员会委员称印度央行外汇储备可保护印度免受动荡影响
item.description: 印度利率制定小组的一位成员表示，随着中东敌对行动的持续深化，印度 7000 亿美元的外汇储备为其经济提供了应对日益加剧的地缘政治动荡的重要缓冲。【原文：India’s $700 billion in foreign exchange reserves gives the economy a crucial cushion against rising geopolitical turmoil, a member of India’s rate-setting panel said, as hostilities in the Middle East continue to deepen.】

item.title: 日本自民党在东京全国投票前惨败
item.description: 日本执政党自民党在东京都选举中遭遇了有史以来最糟糕的结果，在选民对首相石破茂的首相职位作出全国投票裁决前不到一个月的时间里，自民党失去了议会最大政治力量的地位。【原文：Japan’s ruling Liberal Democratic Party suffered its worst-ever result in a Tokyo metropolitan election, losing its spot as the biggest political force on the assembly less than a month before voters deliver a verdict on Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s premiership in a national vote.】

item.title: 伊朗袭击暴露亚洲对中东石油的依赖
item.description: 亚洲各地的石油买家和贸易商正屏息凝视着伊朗周边冲突的升级，因为这个最大的进口地区正在为波斯湾出口中断造成的影响做准备。【原文：Oil buyers and traders across Asia are watching the escalation of a conflict around Iran with bated breath, as the top importing region braces for the impact of any disruption of exports from the Persian Gulf.】

item.title: 英国创建市政债券市场的努力无果而终
item.description: 英国一家为启动本国市政债券市场而成立的机构已停止开展新业务，放弃了长达十年之久的效仿欧美活跃市场的努力。【原文：A UK agency set up to kick-start the country’s municipal bond scene has closed to new business, abandoning a decade-long push to emulate vibrant markets in the US and Europe.】

item.title: 埃尼公司将以约 20 亿欧元的价格向 Ares 公司出售 Plenitude 公司 20% 的股份
item.description: 埃尼公司（Eni SpA）同意以约 20 亿欧元（23 亿美元）的价格将其可再生部门 Plenitude 20% 的股份出售给 Ares Alternative Credit Management，这是该部门的第二次股权出售。【原文：Eni SpA agreed to sell a 20% holding in its renewable arm Plenitude to Ares Alternative Credit Management for about €2 billion ($2.3 billion), a second stake sale in the unit.】

item.description: 中国的土地出让收入骤降至十年来的最低点，导致预算赤字扩大，因为政府加大了支持经济的支出。【原文：China’s revenue from selling land plunged to the lowest in a decade, contributing to the widening of budget deficit as the government ramped up spending in support of the economy.】

item.title: 日本激进分子的影响力在股东否决大洋集团首席执行官一事中显露无遗
item.description: 上周末，股东们否决了佐藤英二连任大洋控股公司首席执行官，这是一个罕见的事件，凸显了激进分子在日本股票市场日益增长的影响力。【原文：Shareholders’ rejection of another term for Eiji Sato as Taiyo Holdings Co. chief executive officer over the weekend was a rare event highlighting the growing clout of activists in Japan’s stock market.】

item.title: 瑞银下调泰国股市评级至 "中性"，原因是政治忧虑加重
item.description: 瑞银集团策略师将泰国股票评级从 "增持 "下调至 "中性"，理由是近期的政治不确定性可能会影响政策方向和投资者情绪。【原文：UBS Group AG strategists downgraded Thai stocks to neutral from overweight, citing recent political uncertainty which could impact policy direction and investor sentiment.】
